lines.text: [voiceover as Brazos rides through the Arizona red rock country]

When your best friend tries to beat you to the draw, it's time to put up your guns. But it was the same in the Panhandle, Wichita, Dodge... living or dying - depending on who whipped out his gun first. But all that's in the past. So long to the guns and may you rest in the peace you never had.
Remember that badge o' his don't die, it just gets up and comes after ya again, in the shirt pocket of another man.
[Tom calls out Brazos for a gunslinging showdown]
